sections.heading: School for Boys and Okeechobee School Victim Compensation Program
sections.text: —(1)The Dozier School for Boys and Okeechobee School Victim Compensation Program is established within the Department of Legal Affairs. The purpose of the program is to compensate living persons who were confined to the Dozier School

sections.heading: 2, ch. 2024-254, provides that “[p]ursuant to rules adopted by the State Board of Education, the Commissioner of Education may award a standard high school diploma to a person compensated pursuant to s
sections.text: 16.63, Florida Statutes, who has not completed high school graduation requirements.”
